title: Andrew Jones – 2015 Speech on Business Mobility
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Andrew Jones, the Parliamentary Under Secretary of State for Transport, at The Society of Motor Manufacturers & Traders in London on 22 October 2015.
